author: Tim Marcin
title: People are dunking on an old Steve Mnuchin video about the $1,200 stimulus checks
description: When you're worth $400 million, folks are going to be *quick* to jump on you when you look out of touch. Thus, the internet pounced all over Treasury Secretary Steven Mnuchin on Thursday for a somewhat misleading clip where he talked about the $1,200 coronavi…
content: When you're worth $400 million, folks are going to be *quick* to jump on you when you look out of touch. Thus, the internet pounced all over Treasury Secretary Steven Mnuchin on Thursday for a somewhat misleading clip where he talked about the $1,200 coronavi… [+2393 chars]
